comment: /**  * Exposes the underlying {@link XmlBeanDefinitionReader} for additional  * configuration facilities and {@code loadBeanDefinition} variations.  */
code: /**  * Exposes the underlying {@link XmlBeanDefinitionReader} for additional  * configuration facilities and {@code loadBeanDefinition} variations.  */ public final XmlBeanDefinitionReader getReader() {     return this.reader. }

comment: /**  * Set whether to use XML validation. Default is {@code true}.  */
code: /**  * Set whether to use XML validation. Default is {@code true}.  */ public void setValidating(boolean validating) {     this.reader.setValidating(validating). }

comment: /**  * Delegates the given environment to underlying {@link XmlBeanDefinitionReader}.  * Should be called before any call to {@code #load}.  */
code: /**  * Delegates the given environment to underlying {@link XmlBeanDefinitionReader}.  * Should be called before any call to {@code #load}.  */ @Override public void setEnvironment(ConfigurableEnvironment environment) {     super.setEnvironment(environment).     this.reader.setEnvironment(getEnvironment()). }

comment: /**  * Load bean definitions from the given XML resources.  * @param resources one or more resources to load from  */
code: // --------------------------------------------------------------------- // Convenient methods for loading XML bean definition files // --------------------------------------------------------------------- /**  * Load bean definitions from the given XML resources.  * @param resources one or more resources to load from  */ public void load(Resource... resources) {     this.reader.loadBeanDefinitions(resources). }

comment: /**  * Load bean definitions from the given XML resources.  * @param resourceLocations one or more resource locations to load from  */
code: /**  * Load bean definitions from the given XML resources.  * @param resourceLocations one or more resource locations to load from  */ public void load(String... resourceLocations) {     this.reader.loadBeanDefinitions(resourceLocations). }

comment: /**  * Load bean definitions from the given XML resources.  * @param relativeClass class whose package will be used as a prefix when  * loading each specified resource name  * @param resourceNames relatively-qualified names of resources to load  */
code: /**  * Load bean definitions from the given XML resources.  * @param relativeClass class whose package will be used as a prefix when  * loading each specified resource name  * @param resourceNames relatively-qualified names of resources to load  */ public void load(Class<?> relativeClass, String... resourceNames) {     Resource[] resources = new Resource[resourceNames.length].     for (int i = 0. i < resourceNames.length. i++) {         resources[i] = new ClassPathResource(resourceNames[i], relativeClass).     }     this.load(resources). }
